scripts.create: sh -c ': "${1:?name is empty}"; mkdir -p $1.d && cd $1.d && cp ../../default/.local.json package.json && cp ../../default/* . && npm install' 'npm run create'
scripts.remove: sh -c ': "${1:?name is empty}"; rm -fr $PWD/${1##*/}.d' 'npm run remove'
scripts.serve: sh -c ': "${1:?name is empty}"; vite $1.d' 'npm run serve'
